channel.title: 2026 on Pierre Morsa

item.title: Elon Musk promises robotaxi will be ready and available by the end of 2026
item.description:
How It Started on 2024-10-10

Elon promised that the robotaxi, named Cybercab, would be ready and available in two years from now. I’m generous, I will give him until end of December 2026. The second claim he made was that it would cost under $30,000.
